english.segment1: (Your tradition). I'm getting so sick of creating this music to please you. The way it used to be is the very thing that blinds you.
english.segment2: That's why you can't see my God move. Cause this is not then, and I'm not like you.
english.segment3: (Damnation). Your excuse for good advice. Their mouths are wide, but you feed them lies. (Reputation). You're full of indecency. You are exactly the portrait they painted you to be.
english.segment5: That's why you can't see my God move. Cause this is not then, and I'm not like you.
english.segment6: You refuse to speak, and they'll listen.
english.segment7: But I won't be predicted. I won't be your stereo. I won't be predicted, never.
